title: Why Is Biden Tapping the Strategic Oil Reserve, and Will That Lower Gas Prices?
sub_head: Biden administration says it will release 50 million barrels of oil in a coordinated effort with other countries
body:
The Biden administration said Tuesday that it would release 50 million barrels of oil from its Strategic Petroleum Reserve in a coordinated effort with other countries to bring down gasoline prices.
Hereâ€™s what you need to know about the SPR.
